attributes.action: Stop a Vulnerable family from being EVICTED!
attributes.additional_details: Change the law on short hold tendencies as vulnerable family's are being evicted because of it. My family have lived in a village for 17 years, we have 7 people living in our house, my daughter who is severely disabled, my husband an ex army soldier injured serving, my older son who is employed but doesn't earn enough to get a house of his own, my oldest daughter who is a student at the local college, my youngest son who is a student at school along with my 5 year old daughter and me a qualified occupation therapist but unable to work due to my husband and daughter. Change the law as we are being evicted for NO REASON what so ever.told by landlord they don't have to give us a reason, just because they can under the short hold tendencies agreement law.we have been tenant for 17 years and have been good tenants. if this can happen to us it can happen to anyone. We are devastated, We have been left with no home, our lives are here. Please stop this from happening to any other  family.
